name: The Catacombs of Cherubim
overview: Deep in the underground catacombs are huge, gleaming treasure boxes that seem to be just waiting for a new owner. However, beware: It is said that they are busy with the magic of the great Zambalo, which is full of diamonds, goblets and pearls. It is certainly not good-natured magic! The legends also tell that deep in the dark corridors and caves are slumbering even more valuable treasure chests with an unspeakably precious treasure ...
